description: This is a BE-BETTER store frontend made with react. Users can browse and buy items provided by the store. The project leverages passport strategies for user authentication through manual users and google accounts. It also leverages stripe for payments.

Seadex, a decentralized exchange (DEX) powered by an AMM system, facilitates token swapping within liquidity pools. Users can earn yield by investing and launch new pools. Operating in Sepolia, it's a user-friendly gateway to DeFi.
This is WeaveSwap, a platform that consists of a Dex and a Lending protocol. It was made for BNB hackaton on dorahacks. My part was to architect and deploy all the smart contracts.

This is a cryptocurrency bridge which enables cross-chain transfer of tokens. It is fully decentralized and uses signing methods to ensure its security. It is made with hardhat using solidity and javascript.

This is a e-commerce store backend made with expressjs and postgresql. It enables the user to retrieve item data, make and use an account (leveraging passport and cookies) and to see orders as well as cart.
My very own Liquidity Pool. It is made with hardhat using solidity and javascript. It has lots of functionalities such as exchange of tokens, liquidity providing, yield farming, and much more...
This is a React app that integrates reddit web API. The user can authorize the app to get real-time reddit posts, comments, and have the ability to vote on the preferred data.

This is a React app that integrates spotify web API. It enables the user the ability to search through Spotify's library, pick and play songs and make new playlists with the songs and name of their choosing.

This is a contract based on ERC1155 token standard. It creates multiple game items such as avatar customizations, powerups and currencies. It uses Chainlink VRF for functionality for randomness of the packs.

My very own openzeppelin DAO integration. This is a charity DAO, which enables the charities to get the funding with little to no intermediate cost fast and reliable. The project is made with hardhat.
My take on EIP712, it includes all the functionalities the EIP712 needs. This is my contribution to project wallet-signature by wiasliaw. It was made using foundry framework.

My very own full stack dapp coinflip minigame made of two smart contracts. One is coinflip gameplay and the second one is gamecoin nft. The frontend is made with nextjs and tailwind css, and the backend is made with solidity and hardhat.
This is a nftmarketplace dapp. I made this dapp when I was going through freecodecamp 32-hour course taught by Patrick Collins.
This is a trading bot made by me purely in python. The trading bot is based on double supertrend strategy with addition of heikin ashi. The exchange that it trades on is binance.
This is a lottery dapp. I made this dapp when I was going through freecodecamp 32-hour course taught by Patrick Collins.
